root.name: save()
root.description: Makes an image from the display window. Images are saved in TIFF or TARGA format depending on the extension of the parameter filename. If no extention is included in the filename, the image will save as TIFF and .tif will be added to the name. This file is saved to the sketch's folder, which is opened by selecting "Show sketch folder" from the "Sketch" menu. It is not possible to use save() while running the program in a web browser.

parameter.label: filename
parameter.description: String: any sequence of letters and numbers
